array.string: set -euo pipefail; labels=(com.ronny.freshness-critical-daily com.ronny.verify-run-daily com.ronny.simplefin-daily-sync com.ronny.finance-backup-weekly com.ronny.media-arr-key-roll-drill-weekly); missing=0; for label in "${labels[@]}"; do if launchctl list "$label" >/dev/null 2>/dev/null; then echo "[$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] OK $label"; else echo "[$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] MISSING $label"; missing=1; fi; done; exit $missing
